description: This file defines a Qwik component for generating and displaying animated flowers with interactive controls, including a range input to adjust the number of flowers and visual effects based on component state.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines the main Qwik component that renders the flower generator UI, manages internal state, and handles lifecycle effects.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Sets up side effects that run when the component becomes visible, including timers for state updates.

methods.name: useStore
methods.description: Creates reactive state for managing the number of flowers and a counter.

methods.name: useStylesScoped$
methods.description: Applies scoped CSS styles to the component.
